thread.section_title: Hotel Forte - UPDATED 2016 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: great location, poor service, argumentative staff, shocking rooms
thread.title_full: great location, poor service, argumentative staff, shocking rooms - Review of Hotel Forte, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: T0mmas051
title: great location, poor service, argumentative staff, shocking rooms
text:
booked and prepaid 6 weeks in advance for 2 adjoining double rooms at the rate of $AUD 275 per night.
were given 1 dingy room just outside the hotel proper next to the lift and the other room was a spare room on the floor above the hotel proper, outside of concierge area and totally without security from possible intruders.
The rooms appear unregistered. They had no room number on the door or on the keys.
No filling in of guests name and address card was required upon check in.
The curtains were covered in dust and the bathroom was incredibly small, old and the shower and tiling covered in mould.
Upon requesting to be changed to a room inside the hotel proper the staff got argumentative and said that this is what we were entitled to for the money we paid and insisted there was nothing wrong with the rooms we were given.
The whole stay was unpleasant and this will have to be the most horrible hotel stay ever.
Photos of mould covered bathroom and un numbered doors attached.
